net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_Util_getAbilitiesInput
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
<html><pre> arg(0) = tokenID
Returns a string used to Input a token's abilities. When processed by input(), the following variables are populated:
'inputStrength', 'inputDexterity', 'inputConstitution', 'inputIntelligence', 'inputWisdom', 'inputCharisma'
